name: United Services Automobile Association
summary: United Services Automobile Association (USAA) is a member-owned financial services company offering insurance, banking, and investment products primarily to U.S. military members, veterans, and their families. Founded in 1922 and headquartered in San Antonio, Texas, USAA serves over 13.5 million members and is recognized for its strong financial performance and commitment to its customer base. The company is privately held and is not publicly traded.
